title: Darwin on death of Tamerlane MCQ 2

content.question: Which of the following most strongly contributed to the shift of power from nomadic empires to settled states that Darwin identifies in the second paragraph?

choices.label: The development and spread of gunpowder weapons across Eurasia
The development of new shipbuilding and navigational techniques
The spread of epidemic diseases across Eurasia, such as the Black Death
The increased recruitment of nomadic soldiers by large agricultural states

content.answer: The development and spread of gunpowder weapons across Eurasia

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
